root.name: Band of Bugs
root.description: Game Features: - Level Editor (same used to create the in-game levels)- Leaderboards - Xbox Live Vision camera support - Online multiplayer Campaign Details: The single player campaign is 20 full levels. Interwoven between the levels is a light story about the main character's search for details related to the threat to his home. Objectives in the single player game are typical; destroying a character or object, defeating all enemies, escaping to a certain predetermined point. Also, similar to the Fire Emblem series, certain levels introduce a third faction to complicate matters. Completion of each level awards the player with a medal based on time taken and player and enemy deaths.
